entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
